name: Necronomimon
description:
Chillenium 2022 Submission by:

Alex Rose - Programming, Combat Design

Michael Freaney - Programming, Music

Keegan McQuin - 3D Artist

Rachel Barner - Concept & UI Artist

-------------------

During battle - click your ability buttons on the left side to attack and use moves!

During character editor - Right click to rotate your buddy, click and drag the part to a limb to attach it!
